title: 4 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords: Cyprograms + Beginner's Guide Low Competition High Demand #kdp

tactics.name: chrome_extension_analysis
tactics.description: Use Amazon's Keyword Tool and Chrome extensions to evaluate keyword profitability metrics
steps: Install and configure Amazon's Keyword Tool Chrome extension
Check BSR, review counts, and keyword strength scores
Analyze total results and average price data
caveats: Avoid including year numbers in titles/subtitles unless time-sensitive
source_quotes: don't include 2023 in title or subtitle

tactics.name: sub_niche_targeting
tactics.description: Focus on specific candy types or audiences (e.g., children, lollipops) to create tailored beginner guides
steps: Identify sub-niches like 'candy making for kids'
caveats: Discrepancies between tools like Titans vs. Amazon Scout Pro
source_quotes: 'you can sub Niche according to whatever kind you want is that a lollipops... for children'

tactics.name: long_tail_keywords
tactics.description: Leverage specific puzzle book niches with lower competition
steps: Target keywords like 'easy cryptograms puzzles for adults'
caveats: Monitor BSR if it's too high
source_quotes: 'easy cryptograms puzzle books for adults large print... beautiful long tail keyword'

heuristics.name: year_in_keyword
heuristics.condition: If keyword contains year number, avoid including in title/subtitle unless niche is time-sensitive
source_quotes: don't include 2023 in title or subtitle

heuristics.name: review_volume_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If keyword has high review count and low BSR, prioritize
source_quotes: 'reviews are a massive 4768... average bestseller rank... 457 500'

heuristics.name: review_threshold_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize keywords with higher BSR scores
